entries.journal_entry_description: Hunt the ferocious minstyngar on the lowest level of the Rryatt Trail.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Your next trial from Krepauk is to hunt minstyngar on the lowest level of the Rryatt Trail: minstyngar bloodspillers, minstyngar deathcallers, and minstyngar bonecrushers.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Return to Krepauk and let him know of your success hunting minstyngar in the depths of the Rryatt Trail.
